resources.string: Tap TWICE if you want close app
The fast App for designing a database.\nIt is free, light and safety.
DbDesigner is working fast for you can work and not wait.
DbDesigner is free forever.\nNo ads. No subscription fees.
DbDesigner has no limits on the size of your databases or their count.
All your databases save only on your phone.
Just a few megabytes give you the ability to design your structures anywhere.
Are you sure? The changes you made will be lost.
Something happened, I cannot paste data from the clipboard
Failed to import SQL. Please check if there is any error in the SQL.
You should write something into title or description
Open the structure at the position that was at the exit

Questions showing only if changes was detected
Copy data type and size from Primary key
When you select some column like a Foreign key data type/size will copy automatically from Primary key
Linking with columns without Primary key
Enable linking Foreign key with columns without Primary key
Will save tables/columns with auto generated name if it is empty
If you On, drawing can be a little slower

Area when tables/notes stick to the grid line
I would love to hear your thoughts and ideas on how I can improve your experience!
Just one cup of coffee for developer
Croissant with a cup of coffee. To not drink just coffee without a bake =)
I can not eat only coffee and sweets. I am a predator and I like meat
You probably really like this app =)

Thank you.
 	You are one of a few people who support this project. I am glad that this application helps you and you continue using it.
 	People like you help this world get rid of annoying ads, make more quality products for free. I have hope that you stay with me.
 	I strongly believe that you will create something great and this app will help you with it.

This application was created by one man in short terms to make the process of DB designing easier.

 	The app is free for all people forever.

 	I want to improve this app but I need your help to do it. Please, open "Feedback" and write down your suggestions. If you have an idea, found a bug or just wanted to ask something, feel free to contact me there. Your opinion is really important to me so I will try to take into account all your wishes.

 	Thanks @natasha, @diana for your help with translation
Thank you for using this app.
Are you sure that you want to RESTORE the backup?
Are you sure that you want to DELETE the backup?
Add other backup to the list
This backup is already in the list
If you enjoy using \"%s\", please take a moment to rate it. \nThank you for your support!
Why you don`t like this app?
I can not open Play market :(
Write why you don\`t like \"%s\" and I will try to fix it
Write an email and I will give answer to you
Write why you don\`t like this app
Do you know that you can swap structures?
Tap and hold on to some structure for one second then drag it where you need
Do you know that you can add structure?
You can add your own structure, just tap on the plus button
Do you know that you can drag a table?
You can drag some table, just tap and hold on a table during one second then move table where you want
Do you know that you can hide parts of interface?
You can hide parts of interface, for it open settings - interface and choose with parts of interface do you want to see
Do you know that you can stick tables to grid?
You can stick tables to the grid, for it open settings - map, then turn on and set up the stick to the grid
Tap on label with your current zoom and zoom will set to 1x
How to create a connection between tables?

To create a connection between tables you need to create two tables with one (at less) row in each of them.
Then open one row for edit, select check box FK (Foreign key), in dropdowns bellow select other table and row like references.
How to change positions of structures?
If you want to change position one structure in the list of structures tap on some structure, hold about 1 second and drag on a position where you want.

When you will open some structure, just tap and drag, you will drag all structure. If you want to change table position press on table hold for 1 second and then you can drag the table where you want.
How to move columns positions in a table?
An open table where you want to change positions of columns. Press on the desirable column, hold for 1 second and move on to a new position.
How to stick tables to grid?
You can position your tables clearly. Open Settings -> Map -> Sticky grid. If you turn on this function your tables will stick to the grid in a selected radius around the grid.
How to change the color theme?
You can change the application theme or some colors in Settings -> Themes
How to off some parts of the interface?
If you do not need some parts of the interface like zoom buttons you can turn off them. To turn off them open Settings -> Interface -> (turn on/off what you want)
How to off double tap for exit?
Open Settings -> General -> Double tap for exit

You can import SQL from your already created database. For it you need an open structure where you want to import SQL -> tap on three dots (right top in the window) -> Import from SQL -> paste your SQL.
Open a structure from which you want to export SQL, tap on three dots (right top in the window), select Export to SQL.
How to export an image of the structure?
Open structure from which you want to create the image, tap on three dots (right top in the window), select Export like an image.
How to create a Primary key with more than one column?
Open the table where you want to create Primary key from two columns and mark two or more columns as Primary key.
If you did not find your question here?
I tried to write some questions from users here. If you have any other questions please write to me in the Feedback window.

1.14
• SQL export - saved last selected wrapper for names
• Renamed "row" to "column"
• Added "unsigned" option for numeric types for MySql
• Changed intro
• Added answer for some questions inside app
• Added some hints
• Added "Delete" option into a structure context menu
\

1.13.2
\n\u2022 Fixed bug with duplicate data types
\n

1.13.1
\n\u2022 Fixed bug with access to file structure on some devices (export image, export SQL into a file, load backup)
\n

1.13
• Added tables/rows description into export SQL
• Added possibility to hide data type
• Fixed SQL code style during export
• Added ENUM specification
• Added possibility to export in SQL one table
• Allowed strings without a primary key to be set as a foreign key
• Fixed viewing in image export dialogs/SQL
• Fixed strings
• Bugs fixed

1.12
• Added search
• Fixed strings
• Added option off the double tap for exit
• Set target SDK 29
• Bugs fixed

1.11
• Added go to next field during editing
• Added "Paste" button into import SQL dialog
• Added stick to grid possibility
• Added possibility set grid cell size
• Fixed enter in description fields
• Added RDBMS select
• Added export into PostgreSQL
• Some refactor
• Added some data types
• Fixed strings
• Added Chinese/French translations
• Added possibility for a clone of structure
• Bugs fixed

1.10
• Auto copy data type/size from primary key when you select row as Foreign(can turn off in settings)
• Edited export image dialog (added extension, quality, export image using devices with low memory)
• Can include drop table scripts in export
• Export SQL into file
• Can drag and drop(change positions) structures
• Added default names for tables/rows (You can save table/row with empty field name and name will be generated automatically like table_2)
• Added question before save/cancel/delete tables/rowsâ€¦ (can turn on/off each type question in settings)
• Optimized for multi windows mode
• Added some optimization for Samsung DEX
• Added external mouse zoom action
• Fixed reload activity after connect external mouse/keyboard
• Fixed other bugs

1.9
• Added description for rows (can show/hide in settings)
• Added Notes
• Disable select "Allow NULL" if primary key is selected
• Added precision for some dat types
• SQL export(select language SQLite/MySql, added wrapper options)
• Possibility to change arrow dirrection
• Added possibility to support project
• Fixed bug with change position rows
• Other bugs fixed
• Optimization(make some faster)

1.8
• Added themes
• Showed restriction value near data type
• Allowed set foreign keys as primary
• Added auto-saving by timer (can off it in settings)
• Added autosave before exit (can off it in settings)
• Changed settings window
• Changed SQL export code formatter
• Added new DataTypes
• Added icons into "Information Dialog"
• Change position save and cancel buttons
• Showed message about errors during import SQL
• New tables will be created +- in center of the screen
• Open structure at the same position like before exit (can off it in settings)
• Added default colors for color picker
• Tap on scale number(1.1x) in the map will set the zoom to 1x
• Changed intro animations
• Added new checkbox
• Added some optimization for older phones
• Fixed some bugs

1.7
• Edited "Edit row" window
• Added choose row color
• Added On Delete/On Update actions
• Added export SQL parameters (Keys, Comments, Table position, Colors)
• Fixed translate errors
• Added release notes
• Fixed bugs with Import/Export SQL
• Fixed others bugs

1.6
• Added zoom
• Fixed not null icon
• Added info for keys in edit table dialog
• Fixed bugs

1.5
• Changed design "Edit table" dialog(you can return old design in settings)
• Bug fixed

1.4
• Added possibility to print tables description on the map
• Bugs fixed

1.3
• Added possibility to change table title color
• Bugs fixed

1.1
• Added possibility make backups
• Bugs fixed
